summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated March 30, 2011. The email contains a confidentiality notice and indicates that the information may be attorney-client privileged. It emphasizes the importance of confidentiality and the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a communication with Jes Staley regarding confidential information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a professional relationship.

The email emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.
